description: I somehow ended up at the construction site. Cool place, but kinda bad timing. It was already closing down. Last one leaving was a manager or a banker or an insurance guy. Didn´t have high expectations but I didn´t hesitate and approached him. He was Slovakian and amazingly hot and sexy. Even with clothes on I could see his well built and masculine body. Fucking A, I want this one. Only thing worried me was his probably higher salary. But I was again lucky. He was planning on buying a flat. So of course he needed money. And he was a business man. He didn´t even mention something about being gay. It was a pure transaction. Service for money. I loved it. I had a place over ready just for us. Told him it´s my friends place, just not to look so creepy and weird.
title: Czech Hunter 188
